title: Header Query
code:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA AS LIBRARY,
TABLE_NAME AS TABLE,
COLUMN_NAME AS FIELD,
COLUMN_TEXT AS DESCRIPTION,
DATA_TYPE,
LENGTH --List fields that will be on output
FROM QSYS2.SYSCOLUMNS --Table you are looking in
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE 'CP1NW' -- Environment Name (Database)
AND TABLE_NAME = 'BLSEIT'-- File Name (Table)
ORDER BY LIBRARY, ORDINAL_POSITION;

title: Customers with S&E in a specific tariff/env
code:
SELECT S1.SERPEX||RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4) as BTN,
EXTRF as Tariff,
CONCYC as BillCycle --List fields that will be on output
FROM CP1FT.SEREQP S1 --Table you are looking in
Left Join CP1FT.Control --Joining a table
ON CONMEX = SERPEX -- on certain matching criteria
LEFT JOIN CP1FT.SYDBEX
ON EXEXC = SERPEX
WHERE S1.SERITM = 'CP001'--Enter SE code and other criteria below
AND S1.SEROTD = '0'
AND CONMLN = SERPLN
AND SERRES = CONMRS
AND CONMRS = '0'
AND EXTRF = 'CCO'

title: Customers with 2 S&Es in a specific tariff/env
code:
SELECT S1.SERPEX||RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4) as BTN,
EXTRF as Tariff,
CONCYC as BillCycle --List fields that will be on output
FROM CP1FT.SEREQP S1 --Table you are looking in
Left Join CP1FT.Control --Joining a table
ON CONMEX = SERPEX -- on certain matching criteria
LEFT JOIN CP1FT.SYDBEX
ON EXEXC = SERPEX
WHERE S1.SERITM = 'CP001'--Enter SE code and other criteria below
AND S1.SEROTD = '0'
AND RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX
IN(
SELECT RIGHT('000'||(S2.SERPLN),4)||S2.SERPEX
FROM CP1LF.SEREQP S2
WHERE RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX = RIGHT('000'||(S2.SERPLN),4)||S2.SERPEX
AND S2.SERITM = 'SFINS'
AND S2.SEROTD = '0')
AND CONMLN = SERPLN
AND SERRES = CONMRS
AND CONMRS = '0'
AND EXTRF = 'CCO'

title: Customers with 3 S&Es in a specific tariff/env
code:
SELECT S1.SERPEX||RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4) as BTN,
EXTRF as Tariff,
CONCYC as BillCycle --List fields that will be on output
FROM CP1FT.SEREQP S1 --Table you are looking in
Left Join CP1FT.Control --Joining a table
ON CONMEX = SERPEX -- on certain matching criteria
LEFT JOIN CP1FT.SYDBEX
ON EXEXC = SERPEX
WHERE S1.SERITM = 'CP001'--Enter SE code and other criteria below
AND S1.SEROTD = '0'
AND RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX
IN(
SELECT RIGHT('000'||(S2.SERPLN),4)||S2.SERPEX
FROM CP1LF.SEREQP S2
WHERE RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX = RIGHT('000'||(S2.SERPLN),4)||S2.SERPEX
AND S2.SERITM = 'SFINS'
AND S2.SEROTD = '0'
AND RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX
IN(
SELECT RIGHT('000'||(S3.SERPLN),4)||S3.SERPEX
FROM CPAFT.SEREQP S3
WHERE RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4)||S1.SERPEX = RIGHT('000'||(S3.SERPLN),4)||S3.SERPEX
AND S3.SERITM = 'FICES'
AND S3.SEROTD = '0'))
AND CONMLN = SERPLN
AND SERRES = CONMRS
AND CONMRS = '0'
AND EXTRF = 'NMN'
Group by S1.SERPEX||RIGHT('000'||(S1.SERPLN),4), EXTRF, CONCYC
